TypeSignature.Value: public class MessageQueueEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerator
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageQueueEnumerator extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.IDisposable
Public Class MessageQueueEnumerator Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
public ref class MessageQueueEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator

summary.span: 提供順向資料指標，進而列舉訊息佇列中的訊息。

span.span: Provides a forward-only cursor to enumerate through messages in a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用動態互動與網路上的佇列。Use for dynamic interaction with queues on the network. 方法可透過類別可以傳回包含動態清單的佇列或陣列，其中包含快照集當時的佇列集合的指定呼叫此方法。Methods available through the class can return either a containing a dynamic list of queues, or an array that contains a snapshot of the queue collection at the time the specified method was called. 沒有佇列的網路中未定義順序。There is no defined ordering of queues in a network. 它們不是已排序，例如，藉由電腦、 標籤、 公用或私用狀態，或其他使用者可存取的準則。They are not ordered, for example, by computer, label, public or private status, or other user-accessible criteria. A是資料指標，初始化為動態清單的開頭。A is a cursor, initialized to the head of a dynamic list. 您可以將游標移至列舉型別的第一個佇列藉由呼叫。You can move the cursor to the first queue of the enumeration by calling . 初始化列舉值之後，您可以使用逐步剩餘的佇列。After the enumerator has been initialized, you can use to step forward through the remaining queues. 不可能藉由向後逐步。It is not possible to step backward with a . 資料指標只允許佇列列舉型別中的向前移動。A cursor only allows forward movement through the queue enumeration. 不過，您可以呼叫重設列舉型別，並將游標放在清單的開頭一次。However, you can call to reset the enumeration and put the cursor at the beginning of the list again. 列舉值是動態的因為附加資料指標的目前位置之後的佇列可以存取的列舉值。Because the enumerator is dynamic, a queue that is appended beyond the cursor's current position can be accessed by the enumerator. 沒有先呼叫 Reset，無法存取插入資料指標的目前位置之前的佇列。A queue that is inserted before the cursor's current position cannot be accessed without first calling Reset. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會逐一查看網路中的所有訊息佇列，並檢查每個佇列的路徑。The following code example iterates through all the message queues in the network, and examines the path for each queue. 最後，它會在網路上顯示公用佇列的數目。Finally, it displays the number of public queues on the network. [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CPP/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/CS/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageQueueEnumerator_noparms/VB/mqgetmessagequeueenumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放與列舉值相關的資源。

span.span: Frees the resources associated with the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作業系統會保留未開啟的控制代碼， ，佇列列舉值的資料指標的存留期間。The operating system retains an open handle, , to the queue enumerator during the lifetime of the cursor. 當您完成使用列舉值時，呼叫釋放控制代碼相關聯的資源。When you finish working with the enumerator, call to release the resources associated with the handle.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As MessageQueue
public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ Current { System::Messaging::MessageQueue ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the current of the enumeration.

value.span: 資料指標目前所在的佇列。

span.span: The queue at which the cursor is currently positioned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立列舉值時，它未指向任何項目，因此不正確，如果它存取將會擲回例外狀況。When the enumerator is created, it does not point to anything, so is not valid and will throw an exception if it is accessed. 您必須呼叫若要將指標放在列舉中的第一個佇列。You must call to position the cursor at the first queue in the enumeration. 多個呼叫沒有中介呼叫傳回相同物件。Multiple calls to with no intervening calls to will return the same object.

exception.span: 在第一次呼叫 之前，請先呼叫 。

span.span: You called before the first call to .

exception.span: 資料指標位於列舉型別中第一個佇列的前面。

span.span: The cursor is located before the first queue in the enumeration.
-or-

exception.span: 您在呼叫 之後呼叫 ，會傳回 False (表示游標位於列舉型別最後的佇列之後)。

span.span: You called after a call to had returned false (indicating the cursor is located after the last queue in the enumeration).
Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 取得用來尋找網路中佇列的原生 (Native) 訊息佇列控制代碼。

span.span: Gets the native Message Queuing handle used to locate queues in a network.

value.span: 目前佇列的原生控制代碼。

span.span: The native handle to the current queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您不再需要此執行個體，請呼叫來釋放資源的這個控制代碼。When you no longer need this instance, call to free this handle to the resource.

span.span: The handle does not exist.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼沒有瀏覽權限。

span.span: The calling code does not have browse permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 如果目前有可用的列舉值，讓列舉值前進至列舉型別的下一個佇列。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next queue of the enumeration, if one is currently available.

returns.span: 如果列舉值成功地前移至下一個佇列則為 ，如果列舉值已經到達列舉型別的結尾，則為 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next queue; if the enumerator has reached the end of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回`false`立即是否有任何列舉型別相關聯的佇列。 returns `false` immediately if there are no queues associated with the enumeration. 會傳回`true`直到它到達集合結尾。 will return `true` until it has reached the end of the collection. 然後它會傳回`false`針對每個後續的呼叫。It will then return `false` for each successive call. 儘管如此，只要傳回`false`、 存取屬性將會擲回例外狀況。However once has returned `false`, accessing the property will throw an exception. 在建立列舉值會在概念上位於第一個列舉型別，以及第一次呼叫使檢視列舉型別的第一個佇列。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first of the enumeration, and the first call to brings the first queue of the enumeration into view.

exception.span: 呼叫程式碼沒有瀏覽權限。

span.span: The calling code does not have browse permissions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重設資料指標，讓它指向列舉型別的開頭。

span.span: Resets the cursor, so it points to the beginning of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值會順向的方向移動。An enumerator moves in a forward-only direction. 使用此方法傳回的列舉佇列的開頭。Use this method to return to the beginning of the enumeration of queues. 將游標放在清單中第一個佇列的時間。 positions the cursor at the first queue in the list. 您不需要呼叫之後呼叫將游標向前移至列舉中的第一個佇列。You do not need to call after calling to move the cursor forward to the first queue in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property Current As Object Implements IEnumerator.Current

span.span: Gets the current of the enumeration.

value.span: 資料指標目前所在的佇列。

span.span: The queue at which the cursor is currently positioned.
